column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ The Chom Chao Police Station reported that two women suspects were caught breaking into factory worker’s rented premises and were arrested.------The incident occurred at 2:00 pm on October 16
column5: at the rented rooms in Trapaing Thloe I Village
column12: are both from Kampong Cham province.------After the arrest
column13: the two suspects were sent by Chom Chao station for questioning and to proceed with legal action.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/379351
